name: Zucchini Salad with Mint and Basil
author: XYZbecker
summary: You need very small zucchini for this delicious zucchini salad with mint, basil, and a zesty dressing. Make sure you marinate it for at least 30 minutes before eating.
ingredients: 6 cups small zucchini, thinly sliced and seeds removed
1 teaspoon lemon juice, or more to taste
½ teaspoon finely grated fresh lemon zest
salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste
directions: Bring water in a saucepan to a boil, add onion in a sieve and blanch for 1 minute
Remove and rinse under cold running water
Add zucchini to the pot with boiling water and cook for 30 seconds
Drain and put zucchini into a bowl with ice water
Move zucchini around so they cool evenly
Combine zucchini, mint, and basil in a large salad bowl
Mix oil, lemon juice, lemon zest, salt, and pepper in a small cup and pour over salad
